survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Subscription-Based Tea Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers on their satisfaction with subscription-based tea services, including quality, variety, delivery, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the tea received through your subscription?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the tea received through your subscription?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you in a tea subscription service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify key priorities.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors are most important to you in a tea subscription service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this tea subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This question measures Net Promoter Score (NPS) potential.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this tea subscription service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our tea subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text input field for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our tea subscription service?

questions.question_text: How often do you typically consume the tea from your subscription?
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How often do you typically consume the tea from your subscription?
